permissions: Authorized via ProjectTransportPlanPolicy; list scope includes plans tied to projects the user can access and plans where the user is an active driver on a plan.
validation_notes: Event time filters require RFC3339 timestamps (event-times-at-*) and event date filters require YYYY-MM-DD (event-times-on-*). Boolean-style filters expect true/false; is-managed uses strict boolean validation. The federated search filter --q accepts a string or list of strings. Sort supports custom fields: transport_order.customer, project_transport_plan_drivers.driver, transport_order.pickup_stop.at_min, transport_order.delivery_stop.at_min, transport_order.ordered_at, completed_stop.actual_start_time.
